last_episode_to_air.name: Gabriel Iglesias
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Gabriel Iglesias was in high school, speech teacher June helped him overcome some serious issues. Now she's at a taping of his show - and in for a big surprise.

name: Thanks a Million
overview: Celebrities kickstart a chain of kindness, each gifting $100,000 to an unsuspecting individual who have had a positive impact on their lives -- with a catch. Watch as the "pay it forward" chain unfolds.
